一个是刻心？怎么安装啊

1403243303 发表于 2015-3-7 12:36
一个是刻心？怎么安装啊Open your minecraft.jar* with an archive tool like 7zip or WinRAR.
Put the class files you just downloaded in there. Overwrite if necessary.
Delete the META-INF folder if it exists in the jar file.
Close the archive and save if asked.
Done and have fun!
用解压包（像7z和rar）打开.minecraft
将你刚下载的class文件放进去，如果有必要的话需要覆盖
如果有META-INF文件夹删除META-INF
关闭即可
